member.name: T:UserManagementAPI.Swagger.ConfigureSwaggerOptions
member.remarks: This allows API versioning to define a Swagger document per API version after the service has been resolved from the service container.

member.name: M:UserManagementAPI.Swagger.ConfigureSwaggerOptions.#ctor(Asp.Versioning.ApiExplorer.IApiVersionDescriptionProvider)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The provider used to generate Swagger documents.

member.name: T:UserManagementAPI.Swagger.SwaggerDefaultValues
member.summary: Represents the OpenAPI/Swashbuckle operation filter used to document information provided, but not used.
member.remarks: This is only required due to bugs in the . Once they are fixed and published, this class can be removed.
